just testing

I like to analyze data to answer research questions and test hypotheses. Currently I work as a senior lecturer at the Department of Pharmaceutical Life Sciences, Faculty of Pharmacy, UiTM Malaysia

I graduated from the [University of New South Wales, Australia](http://www.sph.umn.edu/academics/divisions/biostatistics/) with a PhD in Bioinformatics from School of Computer Science & Engineering (CSE). 

I am a well-known R enthusiast, including serving on the board and being an active member of [R Ladies NYC](http://www.rladiesnyc.org/). 

My full CV is available [here]().
